content: materials purl soho s posy 1 75% superwash merino 15% cashmere and 10% nylon each skein is approximately 159 yards/ 50 grams - color a 2 skeins approximately 200 235 280 335 total yards required we used the color mourning dove - color b 1 1 1 2 skein s approximately 120 140 160 200 total yards required we used the color glacial lake you will also need - a set of us 1 2 5 mm double pointed needles 3 - a set of us 2 3 mm double pointed needles - a small crochet hook 4 and scrap yarn for provisional cast on - stitch holders 5 or scrap yarn note this pattern was originally knit using 2 skeins of anzula s squishy 1 skein of au natural for color a and 1 skein of mauve for color b click here 6 for more on this version gauge - 33 stitches and 34 rounds = 4 inches in pixel stitch pattern on larger needles - 33 stitches and 42 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch on smaller needles sizes adult small adult medium adult large adult extra large - finished foot circumference 7¼ 8¼ 9¼ 10¼ inches unstretched - foot length adjustable - height from top of heel to top of cuff unfolded 5½ 5½ 6 6½ inches unblocked sample we knit the adult medium in posy and the adult small in anzula s squishy 1 https //www purlsoho com/posy 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=968 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23805 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=964 6 https //www purlsoho com/create/2015/06/22/pixel-stitch-socks/
